arts.ttl: Kai Havertz emulates Robin van Persie as Mikel Arteta reveals what's changed for Arsenal star
arts.sum: This time last year, Kai Havertz was being derided as a Â£65m waste of money when he managed only one bullseye in his first 19 appearances for the Gunners - but he's been in stunning form this season

arts.ttl: The bizarre reason why Robin van Persie was snubbed by Tottenham before joining Arsenal
arts.sum: The reason behind Tottenham's decision to snub Robin van Persie (left) before he joined Arsenal has been revealed by former Spurs boss and sporting director David Pleat (inset).

arts.ttl: Arsenal's Kai Havertz equals Robin van Persie goalscoring record against Southampton
arts.sum: Arsenal striker Kai Havertz equals a club goalscoring record set by Robin van Persie in the Gunners' 3-1 victory over Southampton at the Emirates.

arts.ttl: Kai Havertz eyes Robin van Persie feat as Arsenal look to emulate Man United in Southampton clash
arts.sum: Arsenal and Kai Havertz will both have the opportunity to achieve impressive feats in Saturday's Premier League meeting with Southampton at the Emirates Stadium.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heerenveen vs. PEC Zwolle - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Eredivisie clash between Heerenveen and PEC Zwolle, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
